1.0.name: wordpress/qikmo-mobile-website-redirection
1.0.description:
Automatically redirects to your live mobile optimized website provided by Qikmo.

To use this plug in you must have a mobile site provided by Qikmo. Visit http://www.qikmo.com to view our plans and pricing or http://www.qikmo.com/freepreview to request a free preview of your website today.

The Qikmo Mobile Redirection plug in takes care of inserting the lines of code your website needs to properly redirect to your live mobile optimized website when viewed from a smartphone.
